mapper.sql: operation_id, trigger_condition_id, operation_response, create_time, created_by, update_time, updated_by, operation_permission, operation_description, is_enabled, arg
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cdpma_operation (trigger_condition_id, operation_response, create_time, created_by, update_time, updated_by, operation_permission, operation_description, is_enabled, arg) VALUES (#{triggerConditionId}, #{operationResponse}, #{createTime}, #{createdBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{operationPermission}, #{operationDescription}, #{isEnabled}, #{arg})
mapper.update:
UPDATE cdpma_operation
trigger_condition_id = #{triggerConditionId}, operation_response = #{operationResponse}, create_time = #{createTime}, created_by = #{createdBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, operation_permission = #{operationPermission}, operation_description = #{operationDescription}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled},
arg = #{arg},
WHERE operation_id = #{operationId}
mapper.select: SELECT tc.condition_name AS conditionName, tc.rule AS rule, o.arg AS arg, r.response_name AS responseName FROM cdpma_operation o JOIN cdpma_operation_trigger_condition tc ON o.trigger_condition_id = tc.condition_id JOIN cdpma_operation_response r ON o.operation_response = r.response_id WHERE o.is_enabled = 1
